content: Furthermore, no distinction shall be made on the basis of the political, jurisdictional or international status of the country or territory to which a person belongs, whether it be independent, trust, non-self-governing or under any other limitation of sovereignty.
translations: ita:Nessuna distinzione sar√† inoltre stabilita sulla base dello statuto politico, giuridico o internazionale del paese o del
